mapper.select: SELECT fm.*, fd.*, ft.* FROM fest_main fm LEFT OUTER JOIN fest_detail fd ON fm.fest_m_id = fd.fest_dt_id LEFT OUTER JOIN fest_ticket ft ON fm.fest_m_id = ft.fest_tc_id WHERE fm.fest_m_id = #{festMId}
SELECT fm.*, fp.fest_ps_url, fp.fest_ps_no FROM fest_main fm LEFT OUTER JOIN fest_poster fp ON fm.fest_m_id = fp.fest_ps_id WHERE fm.fest_m_id = #{festMId}
SELECT * FROM fest_main ORDER BY fest_m_hit DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fest_main ( fest_m_author, fest_m_name, fest_m_start, fest_m_end, fest_m_loc, fest_m_img, fest_m_genre, fest_m_area) VALUES ('admin_자체등록 member_id', #{festMName}, #{festMStart}, #{festMEnd}, #{festMLoc}, #{festMImg}, #{festMGenre}, #{festMArea})

INSERT INTO fest_detail ( fest_dt_id, fest_dt_casting, fest_dt_crew, fest_dt_runtime, fest_dt_age ) VALUES ( (SELECT fest_m_id FROM fest_main WHERE fest_m_id = #{festMId}), #{festDtCasting}, #{festDtCrew}, #{festDtRuntime}, #{festDtAge} )

INSERT INTO fest_ticket ( fest_tc_id, fest_tc_type, fest_tc_price, fest_tc_time ) VALUES ( (SELECT fest_m_id FROM fest_main WHERE fest_m_id = #{festMId}), #{festTcType}, #{festTcPrice}, #{festTcTime} )
mapper.update: update fest_main set fest_m_name = #{festMName} , fest_m_start = #{festMStart}, fest_m_end = #{festMEnd}, fest_m_loc = #{festMLoc}, fest_m_img = #{festMImg}, fest_m_area = #{festMArea}, fest_m_genre = #{festMGenre} where fest_m_id = #{festMId}
